website_summaries.verdict: Despite technically being a convertible car seat, this option still does a stellar job of securely cradling infants. Ideal if you're looking for a car seat that will grow with your baby.
pros: Generous padding all over with a plush, supportive infant insert
Multiple recline positions and an easily accessible recline lever
Five point harness offers hassle-free no-rethread adjustability
Quick Connector Latch system makes installation a breeze

customer_reviews.title: HORRIBLE, DONT BUY.
customer_reviews.text: Wish I could give 0 stars. This this is enormous and awkward. It will not fit in my ford edge, the latch belt is not long enough AND the latch clips DO NOT stay clicked. Its frightening when you wonder how it would hold up in a collision. When I pull on them they come off. My kids tore up the box so i cant return. Now i have a $150 car seat i cant use and no money to buy a different one :(
customer_reviews.author: Amberlee

customer_reviews.title: No complaints a year later
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this car seat. I am making this review a year after I purchased it, and it comes apart very easily to wash. Puts back together nice and tight.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Cravens

customer_reviews.title: I really love this car seat great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really this car seat I love it love it love it love it very soft very comfortable very nice as you can see my son fits nice and snuggly in it.. the only downside to it to me is it cannot fit in my trunk of my car because it's big.. really big
customer_reviews.author: Jahnin

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to install without the latch system that better models have
customer_reviews.text: We got this car seat for our second baby. We also have the same car seat for our first but with the LATCH installation. This one just has a belt that you pull to tighten and install. The belt is IMPOSSIBLE to tighten. My husband can’t even get it right and he can do everything! We are both so disappointed by it and are hoping we can get the latch installation belts to switch out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: do not buy evenflo car seat!!
customer_reviews.text: This is/was the most aggravating car seat to put it. I had to google this to try and get some tips on how to get this seat tightened enough to carry a toddler. I finally got it as tight as I could, but it was a pain in the butt to do it. I would return this in a heart beat but I got rid of the box it came in.
customer_reviews.author: Gingo

customer_reviews.title: The seats nice, well padded
customer_reviews.text: The seats nice, well padded, big, and seems safe. It is more difficult than other seats to install in the vehical but not terrible. The one thing i dont love is the way it buckles. When you pull the cord to tighten the straps the buckle that clips at the crotch seems to dig into the childs belly and yet if you dont pull it tight enough theres too much slack at the shoulders. Additionally, while its not an issue for me, my arthritic mother has a very difficult time unbuckling the chest strap.
customer_reviews.author: Addi

customer_reviews.title: OMGee👶👶👶👶
customer_reviews.text: Your child will be riding in style!! This is one heavy duty seat and no wonder it's rated so highly for safety standards!! It has slots for the buckles to be placed so that you can easily place your baby into the carseat without the hassel of the straps being in the way. The double cup holder is nice, hoping the elastic will stand the test of time. Would recommend to everyone in need!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Fritz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My son was 6 months when I ordered this. He had got too big for the previous one. He love this one. It sit high so he can see everything, it let’s back for naps, and he’s always comfortable. Now he’s 8 months and he still love his car seat. Happy Baby, Happy Mommy 😊 (that’s his grandpa in the picture💙)
customer_reviews.author: mikela cullins

customer_reviews.title: Extremely sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty car seat. It will protect our baby well. The only problem is installation. I shouldn't have to have a degree in engineering to install a car seat. The manual is thorough, but it is still really hard to unlatch the cover as instructed in order to be able to thread the seat belt through the slot.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Q

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, great quality, and fits in tight places despite what others have said!
customer_reviews.author: Sfisher

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the car seat! He seems to be very happy as well!
customer_reviews.author: alisha r strutton

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't buy again
customer_reviews.text: This seat looks great. Unfortunately it is not the easiest to install rear facing. We had to recline one seat of the van back quite a bit to even latch it in. The straps aren't even tight and secure. You have to keep it on the lowest recline position in rear facing to even use it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda s.

customer_reviews.title: can't beat it....
customer_reviews.text: Great deal, good car seat. We currently have this car seat facing backwards in my 2013 4 door jeep wrangler. Its a tight fit but overall it works well. The sides are a little high, which can make it difficult to maneuver the toddler in, but is probably designed that way for side impact protection. This small issue shouldn't matter once its turned around to be forward facing. We own another graco car seat in my wife's car, and while it cost twice as much as this model, its not twice as nice. This unit serves the purpose just a well for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua K

customer_reviews.title: Great car seat, hard to tighten belts
customer_reviews.text: I found this car seat to be awesome for keeping my grandson safe, but it is very hard to pull out the belts from the front and back. I have no idea why they seem stuck , but with all of my strength I can get them to slide, it' a hassel doing that.
customer_reviews.author: DWS

customer_reviews.title: To hard to install
customer_reviews.text: Nice convertible carseat wanted to love it But unfortunately it was to hard to install ! not Me or my husband could ever get it tight enough to secure it! So had to return it next day.
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Our grandson loved this seat
customer_reviews.text: Our grandson loved this seat. it's comfortable, supportive and will serve him well in to his proper weight and height. He's four years old and about 3' tall and the seat should last him well in to year 5 or longer. His parents like the ease of moving seat in/out of vehicle. Its a perfect choice.
customer_reviews.author: KarHod

customer_reviews.title: Great Car seat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is perfect and comfortable for my 3 year old son. The only thing I don’t like is the cup holders they’re very shallow so any turns make the cups fall right out but the greatness of the car seat definitely outweighs the cup holders. Have even taken it apart to wash and everything was very easy to reassemble. Would recommend to a friend or purchase again if I needed too
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Had the older version of this for my first and the new one still holds up. Easy install, and easy to remove the entire cover to wash after my kiddo got sick in the car and threw up several times on the way home one night.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: We love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseaf! Had the same one but a different color for my oldest son, this one fits my 10month old perfectly! I ha dread reviews saying the straps were messed up, I think they just had one bad one, mine are perfect! My son can sit it in reclined without his chin resting on his chest, so he sleeps perfectly too! Highly recommend evenflo! We don't use any other brand for covertible car seats.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley ashmore

customer_reviews.title: This Car seat is very comfortable but, My son who is 40 inches tall( ...
customer_reviews.text: BEWARE! This Car seat is very comfortable but, My son who is 40 inches tall( 3yrs old) barely fits in it therefore; it was returned. I will say that returning this product through Amazon was a very convenient so, kuddos to Amazon for that.... but, the car seat that I ended up with for my son is the Graco 4ever and I tested it with my 9 year old who can fit in it. I did pay more for it, but your child's safety should be priceless.....
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Espinoza

customer_reviews.title: Trash, return it while you can!
customer_reviews.text: The latch system is AWFUL its impossible to tighten. I've already set the return in process. It's worth having my child back in the cheapie infant seat until I get the refund and order the DLX like I should have. This thing is a nice looking POS in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Brandi F.

customer_reviews.title: Quality feel and easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: One of the big reasons I chose this seat over the other options was because of the seat retention hooks that have a quick release button. Those other crude versions of retention hooks are straight up from satan.
customer_reviews.author: Kal Tipper

customer_reviews.title: Happy customer
customer_reviews.text: We have had this car seat for a couple of months now. My toddler used to have a hard time in the rear facing car seat that we had previously bought. She has no trouble sitting in the car since we bought this evenflo symphony. No issues with the car seat so far. Just wish that it had a level indicator for proper installation but not a deal breaker for us.
customer_reviews.author: Chandana

customer_reviews.title: Baby's head tips forward
customer_reviews.text: My baby is 6 months old and this carseat does not recline enough for her to sleep comfortably when in the car. Her head tops forward and causes concerned for her breathing. The other brand of carseat I have for our other vehicle is much better and I will be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat!
customer_reviews.text: Carseat is roomy and comfortable for my little man. It is a little heavy compared to previous carseat I used for my daughter. But it will grow with him as he gets bigger. Good investment for a long term use carseat.
customer_reviews.author: donna.a

customer_reviews.title: Update: Great safe car seat using rear facing
customer_reviews.text: update: this carseat doesn’t secure correctly in a subaru ascent bucket seat. It wobbles a lot even when I installed the security belts. :( great seat but doesn’t stop moving on the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Luckymomofboys

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this car seat. I needed a car seat that had wide enough head space so my daughter could wear her head phones while watching DVD player. ONLY down side is the cup holders. An 8 oz sippy cup will tip over and fall out when you turn your vehicle.
customer_reviews.author: MrsSmith661

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: We love this car seat!! It is definitely 1 that once its in the car you don't want to have to move it around constantly, but well worth it in my opinion. I don't worry about something happening to my little guy bc I know he is in a great car seat. Best part is that he loves it too, after the car seat arrived I pulled it out and ended up buckling him in, just to make sure everything was were it needed to be and he ended up sitting there for over an hour, wouldn't let me take him out.
customer_reviews.author: Kendel Mullins

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Came early. My son loves it, it's exactly what we needed! I will say it's quite big. It does fit in my Ford Fusion but it's tight. So keep in mind if you have a smaller car
customer_reviews.author: Lollipop

customer_reviews.title: Longevity.
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat its sturdy worth the buy and will last a long time and easy to clean plus I love the colors.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Talk about sturdy car seats
customer_reviews.text: Talk about sturdy car seats....this is great and its big. Lots of room. Only down fall is the middle insert doesn't stay in seat....putting a baby in it can be frustrating. they should send Velcro with the pieces to hold it in place during the time that child needs that insert. But other then that ...comfortable 8month old like it....
customer_reviews.author: PAULA VINCENT

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this car seat! My 11 month old needed to transition to a bigger seat. This one is rear facing and front facing up to 110 lbs. Very nicely cushioned. My little man loves it. Very soft material and easy to clean. Not hard to install. Came on time and in great condition! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Williams

customer_reviews.title: Looks really safe and roomy.
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning because It would not fit in my 2018 Kia Niro in rear facing position. This thing is nice and HUGE. Make sure you have a larger SUV or sedan before buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Car seat
customer_reviews.text: I got this car seat a year ago for my 9 month old son. He hated his last car seat but this one he loves it. The reclining is good for when he naps and he loves to sit right up to see everything. It is very easy to install and very easy to clean. The cover comes off easy so it’s is easily to wash. It’s also very big so I know it will last my little one for along time.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Love them! I bought two one for mY grandsons ...
customer_reviews.text: Love them! I bought two one for mY grandsons age 1 and 2 1/2. My son borrowed my car with the car seats and liked them do much he bought some! Highly recommend! I have a Toyota 4 Runner and one faces forward and one backwards just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda

customer_reviews.title: Bought three one for each vehicle
customer_reviews.text: Great seat, very easy to use in and out of seat. Pay careful attention to instructions for rear facing installation, took a little while to get it right. Feel that our grandson is comfortable and safe. The elastic cup holder fit nearly any cup or drink.
customer_reviews.author: William R. Beeghly

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable but it is a little wide, make sure to check the dimensions in the description
customer_reviews.author: mk

customer_reviews.title: Safe and easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Love this so much was in an accident with toddler son in the car and kept him safe from a rear impact at a dead stop. I purchased a other one identical to replace his after the accident. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura payne

customer_reviews.title: We love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: We love this car seat. It’s soft/cushy and very sturdy with plenty of room for baby to grow. It was easy to install- took about 5 minutes after I watched an instructional YouTube video. And the black & red colors match my car’s interior! Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: #1Amazon-Aholic

customer_reviews.title: Durable & Safe!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great durable car seat! It will last forever if you take care of it. Be sure to have your local fire house install it for you because it's a doozy to install properly & your local fire department guys/gals are more than happy to assist.
customer_reviews.author: AKEllis

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and offers lots of padding. Easy to use and install.
customer_reviews.author: trm4444

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car seat
customer_reviews.text: Perfect carseat for my daughter. She's 6 months old and this car seat will last her a long time. The insert thats included was too short for her. But i think they're more for newborns. Love this car seat. Would buy again. Arrived on time and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: I own 3 of these. Super happy with it. Perfect product!
customer_reviews.author: This Guy

customer_reviews.title: Looks solid and appears to be very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Looks solid and appears to be very comfortable. My new grandson should be safe and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Victor Morales

customer_reviews.title: Very comfy and chic car seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat for my 4 yrs old. I wanted her to be able to sleep in the car. This is an awesome car seat. I really recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Bilgee

customer_reviews.title: Great car sit
customer_reviews.text: Just what I expected the car sit will be for a growing 18 months todker
customer_reviews.author: Gladys Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Bit heavy but love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! It's a bit heavy but otherwise we love it. The shoulder straps are a bit different compared to the traditional adjustable straps but easy enough to figure out!
customer_reviews.author: Julia

customer_reviews.title: Good Seat
customer_reviews.text: This is a good carseat if you don’t mind flimsy cupholders that don’t really hold anything. My grandson’s cup keeps falling out.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Martin

customer_reviews.title: did not get the carseat pictured
customer_reviews.text: i reciced the box super excited opened it to a infant carseat insode and magor box damage looks to be a retuned item the put back on the shelf without inspecting id like a refund and to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: So far we love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: So far we love this car seat. It seems to be comfortable. It is quite large and we have it rear facing in the backseat of my Prius. There is room because I am 5'5'' but if the driver was taller, it might be a problem because my seat is back as far as it can be with the car seat in the back seat behind me.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda M Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome seat and protection.
customer_reviews.text: Great padding and safety. My sons comfortable. I love the different inclines and the cup holders that fit different sized cups and bottles.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Comport
customer_reviews.text: My grand daughter says she likes and thank you 🙏🏼
customer_reviews.author: Kyun Tok Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: This seat is amazing, my grandson is so comfortable in his new seat! It is safe, sturdy and a good fit for the car.
customer_reviews.author: Anika Safi

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: I almost like this better then our Graco. Its a lot easier to get our 12 month old in and out of. I love how easy the straps adjust and loosen up. It was easy to install and
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Wolter

customer_reviews.title: Car seat is HUGE
customer_reviews.text: I really like the looks of this but its so large in the truck. Its so big its hard to even get the baby in it. Very nicely made and great quality. I was really happy with the looks of it! It will take some getting used to!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat
customer_reviews.text: Love this carseat. It wasn't easy to install in truck but installing it in a smaller vehicle would be. My son loves this carseat because it is so comfortable to him and it hugs his body. And I love that I won't have to buy another for a long while.
customer_reviews.author: Celeste Ray

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best investment i have ever made!!! My child is absolutely in love with this car seat!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Gilley

customer_reviews.title: We love these and highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Twins. Love these seats, easy to use, install, clean. Made to be used by real, busy people.
customer_reviews.author: JustinA

customer_reviews.title: Wish it had full cupholders. Otherwise a great carseat.
customer_reviews.text: The car seat is comfy and roomy. Basically as easy to install as other carseats ive tried. It is a bigger car seat but fit well in both by highlander and silverado, front and rear facing. The only real drawback with this carseat is that there isnt full cupholders.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer mckay

customer_reviews.title: ... the past few years and this is truly the best of them
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased serveral car seats for my grand kids over the past few years and this is truly the best of them. The design and functionality is the best on the market. The cost is a little higher and wroth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: harold Newman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit straps!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the easy recline lever, easy install, the pockets to stick the buckles so my son doesn’t have to have them dug out from under his tushy each time, the easy adjust straps so they’re a perfect fit each time and the look of it! Highly recommend this car seat!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with this car seat. My grandson seems content on rides. Easy enough to install.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Amazing carseat. Does take up alot of room.
customer_reviews.text: This carseat is huge. If you don't got alot of room just know that. The adjustment is smooth. Our kid loves this seat and actually has a place to reat his head now when we sleeps on long drives.
customer_reviews.author: C. Failing

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: Seat was easy to install. Is a little large but great for people with an SUV. Our son who was 9 months old at time of purchase absolutely loves it. He doesnt fuss anymore in the car. It is very cushioned and cozy. I am definitely buying a second one for the grandparents car.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Nice car seat for my 15 month old grandson
customer_reviews.text: Nice car seat for my 15 month old grandson. The safety features are nice and desirable but I think my grandson finds this car seat much more comfortable than his old one.
customer_reviews.author: Tena Shelton

customer_reviews.title: 100% recommend 👌
customer_reviews.text: These are the only car seats I use for my kids! All three of them use them and they love them super comfy and easy to install.

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install and take out of car. Our granddaughter seem happy and comfortable in it!

customer_reviews.title: Wish I would have read and understand the install better
customer_reviews.text: Confusing on how they install in vehicles. Could have paid ten bucks more for much easier install

customer_reviews.title: Can you say UPGRADE
customer_reviews.text: So happy I bought this my baby love it and so do I!

customer_reviews.title: Our granddaughter seems comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far no issues. Our granddaughter is 15 months old

customer_reviews.title: Safe
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my son before his 1st bday and he loves it and so so I it’s so spacious and safe at the same time and it came in 3 days

customer_reviews.title: Great Price/Quality Seat
customer_reviews.text: My 2 year old son loves it because he's elevated to see out the window. Also, it reclines just enough so his head doesn't bob if he falls asleep.

customer_reviews.title: great seat, upgraded to this for my 11 month ...

customer_reviews.title: Last Car Seat

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: It's quite bulky, but I guess that's how it goes when is an all in one. Looks sturdy and comfy

customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 11 months old baby and we are very happy with the design.

customer_reviews.title: It's the best car seat I ever purchased
customer_reviews.text: It's the best car seat I ever purchased, it's not as bulky, my son loves it super comfortable and doesn't make him sweaty and hot. I love the colors and the fabric is nice as well.

customer_reviews.title: Last car seat we'll ever purchase
customer_reviews.text: Our baby is almost 8 months, but quickly outgrew his infant car seat. We LOVE this seat. The only negative was how difficult it was to attached to quick latches!

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat my son hated his other infant seat so we bought this one and he loves it. I like the fact that you can loosen and tighten the straps so easily.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice seat. It's been a little difficult to install in my vehicle tho.

product_meta.title: Evenflo Platinum Symphony Elite All-In-One Car Seat
product_meta.description: Color:Kronus| Style:Symphony LXThe Symphony LX All-In-One Convertible Car Seat holds a rear-facing infant from 5-40 lbs. (height: 19-40 inches), forward facing toddlers from 22-40 lbs. (height: 28-50 inches), and accommodates children in its booster mode from 40-110 lbs. (height: 44-57 inches). Simply put, it's the only car seat you will ever need! This top rated car seat meets or exceeds all applicable Federal Safety Standards providing superior protection, and features Evenflo's proprietary e3 Side Impact Protection that significantly reduces side impact crash forces through advanced energy absorption and an expanded zone of protection. The Symphony LX features our 5-point Infinite Slide Harness that allows for an accurate fit every time. No constant fiddling with the harness as the child grows. With our exclusive Quick Connector Latch System, this car seat can be installed safely and swiftly, which makes it great for moving between multiple vehicles. Other features include: energy absorbing foam liner, 1-hand adjustable headrest, removable head and body pillow for additional comfort and support, up-front multi-position recline for child's comfort while asleep or awake, easy-off, machine-washable car seat pad, integrated cup holder for easy access to drinks. The Evenflo Symphony LX All-In-One Convertible Car Seat for infants, toddlers and children is designed, engineered, tested, molded and assembled in the United States. For almost a century, Evenflo has been a leader in safety, innovation and education. The Evenflo Symphony LX adheres to that mission in providing a convertible car seat that combines safety, comfort and ease for the ultimate luxury in child restraints.
feature_bullets: This All-In-One Convertible Car Seat fitting children from 5-110 pounds is the only car seat you'll ever need providing rear-facing, forward facing and booster capabilities
The Symphony LX helps protect rear facing infants from 5-40 pounds, forward facing toddlers from 22-65 pounds and high back booster mode supports children 40-110 pounds
Quick Connector LATCH system safely attaches and detaches to car with one hand, making movement between multiple cars easy;Evenflo Temperature Testing
The 5-point Infinite Slide harness easily slides to adjust for an accurate fit every time which means easy in and out for your child
Evenflo's proprietary e3 Side Impact Protection significantly reduces side impact crash forces up to 50% through 3 layers of expanded zone protection
All in one car seat-the only car seat you will ever need
Quick connector latch, infinite slide tanress, and one-hand adjustable headrest
65 pound harness weight rating accommodates growing children longer
Integrated cup holder for easy access to drinks

specifications.Care instructions: DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat.
